description.p: Webots is an open source and multi-platform desktop application used to simulate robots. It provides a complete development environment to model, program and simulate robots. It has been designed for a professional use, and it is widely used in industry, education and research. Cyberbotics Ltd. maintains Webots as its main product continuously since 1998.
NOTE: This wrapper is not verified by, affiliated with, or supported by Cyberbotics Ltd.
